T02D2446:79a-1: t'a ki ni badzra gu hya g'i ti n'a ma /
T02D2446:79a-3: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba /
T02D2446:79a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2446:79a-5: au dum b'a ra'i autpala rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon //
T02D2446:79a-6: g-yul ngo mi ldog gyad kyi dgos pa stor //
T02D2446:79a-7: nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam //
T02D2446:79a-8: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la zhon pa'i skyes bu brel //
T02D2446:79a-9: chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'di bcad mi nus //
T02D2446:79a-10: lcags kyi pha wang gyen la 'dril bar dka' //
T02D2446:79a-11: nyi zla'i 'khor lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus //
T02D2446:79a-12: mig ser nad kyis btab na dung yang ser //
T02D2446:79a-13: byang blta'i phug par nyi zla'i 'od mi 'char //
T02D2446:79a-14: skyes bu rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo blun //
T02D2446:79a-15: dug ni srog gi bdud yin mngar yang dor //
T02D2446:79a-16: rba la 'byol ba'i mnyan pa bya btang bskyed //
T02D2446:79a-17: nang la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza' //
T02D2446:79a-18: punda r'i ka'i sa bon ma mthong ngam //
T02D2446:79a-19: lha sras bzod pa che na kun gyis 'khur //
T02D2446:79a-20: tshong dus 'gron po 'brel med tshogs kyi 'gyes //
T02D2446:79a-21: sbrang ma rtsi bcud mang bas sdug bsngal skyed //
T02D2446:79a-22: ngal sar mkhar len byed pa'i skyes bu blun //
T02D2446:79a-23: sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi skye //
T02D2446:79a-24: brag ca'i sgra 'di stod smad smra mi byed //
T02D2446:79a-25: rmi lam bde sdug 'di ni sad pas stong //
T02D2446:79b-0: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur @79b las brul tsho dang po'o /
T02D2446:79b-2: // / aa ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor //
T02D2446:79b-3: skyes bu skam gyis gdungs pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod //
T02D2446:79b-4: mkha' la 'brug sgra bsgrags pas dus kyi yid ches byas //
T02D2446:79b-5: khyim bdag khe mthong las la ngal ba med //
T02D2446:79b-6: nad kyis nyen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga' //
T02D2446:79b-7: ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed //
T02D2446:79b-8: nye zho med pa'i tshang tshol khu rta sgrim //
T02D2446:79b-9: drang srong rigs ldan ya nga'i kha zas spong //
T02D2446:79b-10: dor sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde //
T02D2446:79b-11: dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la //
T02D2446:79b-12: til ngar ldan pa'i gri thogs kun du rgyug / mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs legs su gyis //
T02D2446:79b-13: gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos //
T02D2446:79b-14: bung bas rtsi bcud ma lus ro gcig sdud //
T02D2446:79b-15: gyad ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 'joms //
T02D2446:79b-16: rgol ba mi ldog stobs ldan ci yi phyir //
T02D2446:79b-17: gsang tshig mi sgrub blon po gros mi dbang //
T02D2446:79b-18: bka' bzhin mi bsgrub rgyal po'i gshed mas spong //
T02D2446:79b-19: srog rgol dgra la bzod par mi rung bsre //
T02D2446:79b-20: rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shi yang slob //
T02D2446:79b-21: khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed //
T02D2446:79b-22: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gnyis pa'o /
T02D2446:79b-24: // / yid bzhin nor bu khur du khur nas kyang //
T02D2446:79b-25: stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te //
T02D2446:79b-26: bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung bar bya //
T02D2446:79b-27: chu bo sgrol ba'i gru la zag lhan gdab //
T02D2446:79b-28: sgo lnga mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos //
T02D2446:79b-29: srog dang bral ba'i skyes bu de ci sems //
T02D2446:79b-30: mkhan bzos ma byas bse ru'i gzugs la lta //
T02D2446:79b-31: btso sreg ma byas sa bon myu gu'i rgyu //
T02D2446:79b-32: bram ze skud pa 'khal ba'i drung du sdod //
T02D2446:79b-33: na bun thibs po 'di ni rlung gis gtor //
T02D2446:79b-34: glang chen smyon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug / bung bas me tog rtsi thob phyir mo blta //
T02D2446:79b-35: mkha' la 'ja' tshon skyon bral rang sar yal //
T02D2446:79b-36: 'grul pos chu sgrol gru yi gces 'dzin zhig / mthong byed mig dang bral bas yul rnams 'gags //
T02D2446:79b-37: rgyal po'i bka' la brnyas na chad pa'i gnas //
T02D2446:79b-38: mthon po'i rtse ni lhung ba'i gnas yin gzabs //
T02D2446:79b-39: 'dab gshog ya 'gal gyis ni 'phur mi nus //
T02D2446:80a-0: @80a * // nam mkha'i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar //
T02D2446:80a-1: mkha' la char rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs //
T02D2446:80a-2: ded dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi ched //
T02D2446:80a-3: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gsum pa'o /
T02D2446:80a-5: // / dig mas tshig tu smras pa med //
T02D2446:80a-6: chu shal zla ba su yis byas //
T02D2446:80a-7: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo mtshar che //
T02D2446:80a-8: nam mkha'i dbyings dang kha dog su yis mthong //
T02D2446:80a-9: bar snang dangs pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu /
T02D2446:80a-10: na bun 'di la ngos gzung 'dug gam ci //
T02D2446:80a-11: rna dbang sgra la zin pa'i ri dags blun //
T02D2446:80a-12: dbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dags ltos //
T02D2446:80a-13: gnyen po 'phrig dang ldan pas sha ba ltos //
T02D2446:80a-14: chu yi zla ba ma bsgul bzhag na drungs //
T02D2446:80a-15: til gyi mar me gsal dangs dar dang ldan //
T02D2446:80a-16: rmi lam bde ba'i nyams ni sad pas stong //
T02D2446:80a-17: rgyal pos sa srung ral gris rgol ba 'joms //
T02D2446:80a-18: khro bo'i gzugs brnyan 'di yis byis pa sdigs //
T02D2446:80a-19: gnam lcags thog gi shugs la sra snyi med //
T02D2446:80a-20: chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtad //
T02D2446:80a-21: 'ja' tshon ngo bos stong pas spang blang med //
T02D2446:80a-22: na bun mkha' la yal ba'i byung sa ltos //
T02D2446:80a-23: dngos med mun pas khyab pa'i nam mkha' las //
T02D2446:80a-24: sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sprin 'thibs //
T02D2446:80a-25: char rgyun du mas 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas //
T02D2446:80a-26: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho bzhi pa'o /
T02D2446:80a-28: // / myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs //
T02D2446:80a-29: chu nang zla ba cha med nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin //
T02D2446:80a-30: ga bur nus pa 'di yi sman dug byas pa med //
T02D2446:80a-31: chab rom snang yang chu las gud na grub pa med //
T02D2446:80a-32: na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha med gzung bas stong //
T02D2446:80a-33: me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba tsam //
T02D2446:80a-34: mo gsham bu yi pham khyod kyis mthong ngam ci //
T02D2446:80a-35: skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin //
T02D2446:80a-36: litstsha b'i yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go //
T02D2446:80a-37: aa lu ngo shes byis pa de dus brid du med //
T02D2446:80a-38: 'a tsi ba la'i mtshang rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi dgos //
T02D2446:80a-39: nor bu lag tu lon pa'i ded dpon dbul dang bral //
T02D2446:80a-40: shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med //
T02D2446:80b-0: nam @80b mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis gang la sgrib //
T02D2446:80b-1: gser la gzugs brnyan du ma byas kyang gser nyid yin //
T02D2446:80b-2: grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas spang blang med //
T02D2446:80b-3: drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed //
T02D2446:80b-4: dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol pa'i las mi byed //
T02D2446:80b-5: nam mkhas nam mkha' bsten pas nam mkha' phyi nang 'dres //
T02D2446:80b-6: spang blang med pa'i nam mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar //
T02D2446:80b-7: 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro ba gso bskyed byas //
T02D2446:80b-8: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las bzla ba'i brul tsho ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2446:80b-10: // / zhing pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la ;
T02D2446:80b-11: / lus ngag las la du ba pa med //
T02D2446:80b-12: mtshan dpes brgyan pa 'khor los sgyur //
T02D2446:80b-13: gdan sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces //
T02D2446:80b-14: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D2446:80b-15: sgyu ma tsam du brtse bar bya //
T02D2446:80b-16: mdung rtse lnga la ngar blud de //
T02D2446:80b-17: nam mkha'i 'o ma dbug par bya //
T02D2446:80b-18: them skas gdang bu bzhi la dbab //
T02D2446:80b-19: gzhon dus byis pa zas kyis bkol //
T02D2446:80b-20: gangs kyi thigs pa mi dbo bar //
T02D2446:80b-21: dbyang thag 'dren pa'i thag pa bzung //
T02D2446:80b-22: rlung gis mkha' la sbar nas kyang //
T02D2446:80b-23: chu bran yur ba gzung bar bya //
T02D2446:80b-24: chab rom smin pa rdo yi mi //
T02D2446:80b-25: skye dang 'chi bas slu mi shes //
T02D2446:80b-26: des ni mchog gi nor bu'i gter //
T02D2446:80b-27: rma bya'i zas ni btsan dug nyid //
T02D2446:80b-28: me yis tshig la me nyid sman //
T02D2446:80b-29: 'dod can rnams kyi don du ni //
T02D2446:80b-30: thabs kyi khyad par gzhan las 'phags //
T02D2446:80b-31: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las rtsa ba'i de nyid bstan pa ste brul tsho drug pa'o /
T02D2446:80b-33: // / rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i gzugs //
T02D2446:80b-34: srid dang zhi ba'i byed pa'o //
T02D2446:80b-35: srid pas gzugs su bzung pas 'ching //
T02D2446:80b-36: zhi bas der 'dzin spros dang bral //
T02D2446:80b-37: srid pas dbus su bcug pa yis //
T02D2446:80b-38: lhan cig skyes pa 'dzin par byed //
T02D2446:80b-39: rtsa gsum 'khor lo bzhi sogs kyis //
T02D2446:80b-40: lus rnams kun la khyab par gnas //
T02D2446:80b-42: yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2446:80b-43: dgu brgya bcu gcig grangs them na //
T02D2446:80b-44: rtog pa rlung gis za bar abyed //
T02D2446:80b-45: mi rtog lnga po shar ba yis //
T02D2446:80b-46: las kyi rmang rdo lnga po bcom //
T02D2446:80b-47: 'od gsal ba yi don mthong nas //
T02D2446:81a-2: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las rlung gi de nyid bshad pa ste brul tsho bdun pa'o /
T02D2446:81a-4: // / phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag mkha' 'gro
T02D2446:81a-5: ma rdo rje gsang ba'i mgur brul tsho bdun du
T02D2446:81a-7: / mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyi bka' bgros nas /
T02D2446:81a-8: ka ma la sh'i la la gtad /
